title: MYB
description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MYB, skipping any feeds with errors.

items.title: 5 Reasons You Should Still Learn To Code
items.description: A recent AI Daily Brief podcast took on the question based on a lot of industry debate.

items.title: Amazon Drops iPhone 16 Price In Rare New Apple Sale
items.description: Amazon has slashed the price of the Apple iPhone 16 for its Spring sale.

items.title: Google’s Best Gemini AI Chatbot Is Now Free To Use — But There’s A Catch
items.description: Google Gemini 2.5 Pro Experimental is free to use, but only paying Gemini Advanced users can access its full power with Canvas.

items.title: Samsung Galaxy Watch 8 Plans: No Ultra 2 But Classic Returns In 2025?
items.description: Six watch models have been referenced in a Samsung test firmware package, offering clues as to what's coming in the Samsung Galaxy Watch 8 range.

items.title: Obvious vs perhaps
items.description: “Obvious” closes the door to inquiry. “Perhaps” opens it.
